title: Huge Battle of Antietam:  Confederates Outnumbered - Ultimate Generals: Civil War Gameplay
description:
The day is 17th of September 1862.  The confederate forces are out numbered, but hold strategic defenses.  They must hold against Union attack and defend Sharpsburg.  This is the battle of Antietam. Enjoy the Battle :D

Ultimate Generals: Civil War is a Indie strategy game that is based on the American Civil War.  The game consist of a campaign and historical battles.

Steam Link: http://www.ultimategeneral.com/ultimate-general-civil-war/


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
